guides.title: Guides & Templates
guides.chatgpt_desc: Use this prompt with any AI model (ChatGPT, Claude, Llama) to generate compatible scripts.
guides.json_desc: Structure for bulk project creation via API or Import.
guides.tip_desc: Replace <1>[TOPIC]</1> with your specific subject matter (e.g., "The History of Rome" or "SpaceX Starship Launch").
guides.batch_desc: You can ask the AI to "Generate 5 different scripts" using this same format, then copy each JSON block.
guides.batch_prompt_desc: Generate a full content strategy for an entire week at once.
guides.characters_desc: Learn how to define characters for consistent visual identity across scenes.
guides.char_prompt_code:
Visual Description: [DETAILED DESCRIPTION]
- Age/Gender: ...
- Hair Style/Color: ...
- Clothing: ...
- Distinctive Features: ...
- Art Style: [e.g., Realistic, Anime]

(Copy this into the 'Visual Description' field in the 'New Character' modal)
guides.char_tip: Upload 3-5 images of the same character in different angles to lock their identity.

folders.title: Folders
folders.delete_confirm: Delete this folder? WARNING: This will permanently delete ALL projects and subfolders inside it, including all generated assets (images, video, audio). This action cannot be undone.

dashboard.title: Your Projects
dashboard.empty_state: No projects found. Create your first video!
dashboard.subtitle: Ready to create your next viral video?
dashboard.no_projects_desc: Your studio is empty. Start your first automated workflow to generate scripts, images, and voiceovers in seconds.
dashboard.delete_permanently_warning: You are about to permanently delete this project:
dashboard.assets_deleted_description: Images, audio, and videos stored in R2 will be permanently deleted.

input.title: Create Your Story
input.subtitle:
AI Director, Cinematographer, and Narrator.
All in one place.
input.topic_placeholder: e.g. A cyberpunk detective searching for his lost android cat in Neo-Tokyo...
input.visual_style_subtitle: Choose the aesthetic for your storyboard.
input.char_desc_placeholder: Visual Description (e.g. A tall man in a black trench coat...)
input.no_voices: No voices available for this language
input.daily_limit: Daily Limit: 1 Video for Free Plan
input.delete_char_message: This character will be removed from your library. This action cannot be undone.
input.footer_desc: Generates a detailed storyboard, script, and audio assets.
input.edit_subtitle: Adjust settings and regenerate your project
input.initial_tip: Ask for script ideas, content planning, or just chat.
input.error_message: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

script.confirm_regenerate_script: Regenerate script? This will replace current scenes.

scene.regenerate_confirm: This will overwrite the existing file. Are you sure you want to continue?

video_player.mp4_not_supported: MP4 is the standard format for server-side exports.
video_player.upload_placeholder: Upload a vertical video (1080x1920) to play after the generated content.
video_player.warning_desc: Rendering happens on the server. You can safely switch tabs.
video_player.tip_performance: Rendering is done on the server, not using your PC resources.
video_player.tip_quality: Choose between 30 or 60 FPS. We export in 1080x1920 (Full HD) for maximum compatibility.
video_player.tip_format: MP4 offers better compatibility. WebM is faster but some editors may not support it.
video_player.tip_stay: You will be notified once the video is ready.

settings.title: User Settings
settings.gemini_help: Get your key from Google AI Studio.
settings.groq_help: Used for fast TTS via PlayAI models.
settings.security_note: Keys are encrypted client-side and stored securely. They are only decrypted for API calls.

auth.welcome_subtitle: Create viral vertical videos with Gemini 2.5
auth.backend_connected: Connected to Backend â€¢ Admin Mode

settings.welcome: Welcome to settings! Here you can manage your profile and API keys.
settings.gemini: Google Gemini key is required to generate scripts and video intelligence.
settings.gemini_link: Get key from Google AI Studio
settings.elevenlabs: Optional: Add your ElevenLabs key for ultra-realistic voiceovers.
settings.save: Don't forget to save your changes here!

creation.topic: Enter the main topic of your video here. Be creative!
creation.language: Choose the output language. The script will be translated automatically.
creation.duration: Set the estimated duration. This helps control script length.
creation.style: Select a visual style to keep image consistency (e.g., Cyberpunk, Anime).
creation.characters: Create recurring characters to use in your scenes.
creation.audio: Configure the narrator voice and background music here.
creation.generate: Ready? Click here to generate the magic!

script.controls: Here you control the project flow, regenerate audio and video.
script.scenes: This is the scene grid. Click on a scene to edit it.
script.add_scene: Need more content? Add a new scene manually.
script.generate_all: Generates all media (images and audio) for pending scenes.
script.export: Download raw assets (images, audio) for external editing. For the final video, use Preview.
script.no_project: Please select a project to start the tour.

preview.player: Watch the final result here. The video is assembled in real-time.
preview.controls: Control playback, pause, and navigate through scenes.
preview.subtitles: Toggle automatic subtitles on or off.

export.welcome: Welcome to the export tour! Here you'll learn how to export your video with the best settings.
export.open_modal: Click this download button now to open export options, then click Next.
export.format_step: MP4 is more compatible (IG/TikTok). WebM is faster.
export.resolution_step: 1080p for max quality or 720p for lighter files.
export.fps_step: 60 FPS for smoother motion. 30 FPS for smaller size.
export.merge_step: Append an outro video automatically at the end.
export.confirm_step: Click here to request video rendering on the server.

folders.welcome: Organize your work with Folders. Drag & drop projects!
folders.drag: Drag folders into other folders to organize.
folders.edit_menu: Click the 3 dots to Edit, Archive or Move your projects.

guides.welcome: Explore our ready-to-use guides and templates!
guides.sidebar: Navigate between AI Prompts, JSON Schemas, and Character Templates.
guides.copy: Copy any template with one click and use it in your projects.

link_modal.title: Link Channel to Folder
link_modal.no_channels: No channels available. Connect a channel first.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.delete_plan_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this plan? This might affect users assigned to it.

channels.title: Channel Manager
channels.subtitle: Manage connected channels & AI personas
channels.no_videos_desc: Unable to load videos for this channel. This could be because:
channels.no_videos_reason_1: The channel hasn't been synced yet
channels.no_videos_reason_2: The backend endpoint is not configured
channels.no_videos_reason_3: The channel has no published videos
channels.check_log: Check browser console (F12) for detailed error logs

personas.library_subtitle: Choose your AI scriptwriter style or chat with them directly
personas.no_results: No personas found for this category

persona_form.create_subtitle: Define a custom AI personality for your scripts.
persona_form.desc_placeholder: Brief description of this persona's purpose...
persona_form.instructions_tooltip: The core instructions that define how the AI behaves. Be specific about tone, style, and structure.

batch_render.select_projects_description: Choose projects from this folder to batch render
batch_render.configure_render_description: Set video settings for all projects
batch_render.note_text: Videos will be rendered sequentially on the server. You can close this window and the queue will continue.
batch_render.tip_1: 1080p @ 60fps offers maximum quality but takes longer
batch_render.tip_2: Background music will be applied to all videos
batch_render.tip_3: Ending video will be added to the end of each project
batch_render.queue_empty_description: Add projects to the queue to get started
